name: Idle Cook: Chef Candy Merge
description:
10 minutes into this game and you like it.
20 minutes into this game and you are addicted.
Idle Cook: Chef Candy Merge & create new Candy!
Very easy to learn and super easy to get hooked. Idle Cook: Chef Candy Merge candies with one another to upgrade your candies. Unlock new worlds of candies.
Make money to buy new candies and merge them too!
Welcome to the Chef Candy Merge!
